attributes.action: Extend the line North of the Proposed east -West link to serve Brackley
attributes.additional_details:
With plans to build the east -west rail link , at its junction with the former Great Central Line route , extend the line North East, to Brackley , and having a Parkway station built just south -west of the A43 by pass, between the Buckingham Rd and Oxford Rd roundabouts.
This would benefit those who commute from Brackley to stations at Bicester , creating a far less a need for fuel usage ,and parking at Banbury or Bicester.
Offering services to London Marylebone ,and also feeding into the east -west link with a station where the railway lines cross.
